reviews.title: Seemed good, what I could see...
reviews.comment: Lots of old classics mentioned, many I\'d forgotten hearing about as major releases in classic Cinema etc. Unfortunately I can\'t say anything about more modern films, as the app crashes after just a little scrolling for me, every time.
reviews.author: Nic Guthrie

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: I really didnt want to give any stars I just downloaded this so called app and all it does is closes
reviews.author: Renee Annette

reviews.title: Useless
